name: No More Space
description:
The Duper virus has taken over your computer and is making random files to remove space from your hard drive and format your drive!

Prevent that from happening by deleting the files and using antiviruses to slow down the file making and save yourself from a blue screen of death!

Big thanks to my brother who helped me with the scripting. He doesn’t have a Ludum Dare account, but I’ll link his YT channel: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/TeamDevilGamers101

Please report a bug if you encounter one

PLEASE PLAY AT 1280x720 RESOLUTION
